name: XWUICard
description: Content card container component with header, body, and footer slots. Supports cover images (via XWUIImage), XWUITitled (icon, title, subtitle, body), XWUIBadge (next to title), XWUITag (footer chips), and customizable padding. Can be hoverable and clickable. Maintains backward compatibility with legacy cover, content, header, and footer properties.

input.description: Input data required for the component
rules: New API: image (XWUIImageData or URL string), icon, title, subtitle, body, badge, tags
Legacy API: header, title, subtitle, cover, content, footer (maintained for backward compatibility)
If icon/title/subtitle/body provided, uses XWUITitled component
If badge provided, renders XWUIBadge next to title
If tags provided, renders XWUITag components in footer
If image provided, uses XWUIImage component (falls back to cover for backward compatibility)

image.description: Image data (XWUIImageData object) or URL string. Uses XWUIImage component. Takes precedence over 'cover'.

icon.description: Icon name for XWUIIcon (used in XWUITitled)

title.description: Card title text (used in XWUITitled or standalone)

body.description: Card body content (used in XWUITitled). Takes precedence over 'content'.

badge.description: Badge data (XWUIBadgeData object) or simple count number. Renders next to title.

tags.description: Array of tag data (XWUITagData objects) or simple strings. Renders in footer as XWUITag components.

header.description: Custom header element or string (legacy - use icon/title/subtitle/body for new API)

cover.description: Cover image URL (legacy - use 'image' for new API with XWUIImage support)

content.description: Card body content (legacy - use 'body' for new API)

footer.description: Card footer (legacy - use 'tags' for new API with XWUITag components)

rules: Renders card element with header, body, and footer sections
Uses XWUIImage for image display if 'image' provided, falls back to simple img for 'cover'
Uses XWUITitled for icon, title, subtitle, and body if provided
Renders XWUIBadge next to title if badge provided
Renders XWUITag components in footer if tags provided
Falls back to legacy rendering for header, content, footer if new API not used
Applies variant styling (default, outlined, elevated, filled)

actions.description: User actions supported by the component
rules: Click event fires when card is clicked (if clickable is true)
Keyboard navigation (Enter/Space) triggers click (if clickable is true)
Hover effects applied when hoverable is true
onClick event handler can be registered

clickable.description: Make card clickable (adds role=button and keyboard support)

className.description: Additional CSS class name for the component
